verbose_text: Strikingly, in all of the tissues / cells examined (liver, muscle and MEFs), ablation of LKB1 farnesylation significantly inhibited both basal and AMPK activity stimulated by treatments such as AICAR (XREF_FIG A and Supplementary Figure S4), muscle contraction (XREF_FIG A and XREF_FIG B) and phenformin that are dependent on LKB1 [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
